Remedy.Procedure:
Soak a few drops of rose water on two cotton pads for 2-3 minutes.

Apply to the affected area for 15 minutes.

Repeat twice daily until results are visible.

Cut a cucumber into thick slices and place in refrigerator for 30 minutes to cool.

Place cold slices on the affected area and leave for 10-15 minutes.

Rinse with water.

Repeat twice daily until results are visible.

Apply a small amount of almond oil to the affected area and gently massage for 3-4 minutes.

Leave overnight and rinse with water the next morning.

Repeat daily until results are visible.

Use a cotton ball to apply a few drops of lemon juice to the affected area.

Leave for 10-15 minutes and rinse with water.

Repeat regularly until results are visible

Grate 1-2 chilled potatoes to extract its juice.

Use a cotton ball to apply the juice to the affected area.

Leave for 10-15 minutes and rinse with cool water.

Repeat regularly until results are visible.

Note:Alternately place thick potato slices on the affected areas for 12-15 minutes.

Mix 1/2 teaspoon of turmeric powder and pineapple juice to make a paste.

Apply to the affected area and leave for 10 minutes.

Rinse with water and pat dry.

Repeat daily until results are visible.

Combine equal quantities of tomato juice and lemon juice.

Use a cotton ball to apply the juice to the affected area.

Leave for 10 minutes and rinse with water.

Reppeat daily until results are visible.

Cut a ripe apple into thick pieces.

Apply to the affected area for 30 minutes and rinse with cold water.

Repeat regularly until results are visible.

Soak a clean wash cloth in cold water or milk for 2-3 minutes.

Wring the cloth and apply directly to the affected area.

Leave for 3-5 minutes.

Repeat 2-3 times until results are visible.

Apply crushed mint leaves to the affected area.

Leave for 5-10 minutes and wipe with clean cloth.

Repeat regularly until results are visible.

Mix orange juice and a small amount of glycerin.

Use a cotton ball to apply the juice to affected area.

Leave for 2-3 minutes and rinse with water.

Repeat regularly until results are visible.

Ingredients: 2 used Green or Black teabags placed in Refrigerator for 30-40 minutes
Remedy.Procedure:
Place 2 used black or green teabags in refrigerator for 30-40 minutes.

Apply the chilled teabags to the affected area and leave for 10-15 minutes and rinse with water.

Repeat 1-2 times daily until results are visible.

Apply cold milk soaked cotton balls to the affected area and leave for 5-7 minutes.

Repeat 3-4 times daily until results are visible.

Apply coconut oil to the affected area and gently massage for 2-3 minutes before going to sleep.

Leave overnight and rinse with water the next morning.

Repeat daily until results are visible.

Soak 2 teaspoons of fenugreek seeds in water for 3-5 hours.

Add 1/2 teaspoon of turmeric powder and 1 teaspoon of milk and grind into a paste.

Apply to the affected area.

Leave for 15-20 minutes and rinse with cold water.

Repeat daily until results are visible.

Mix 2 teaspoons of buttermilk and 1/4 teaspoon of turmeric powder in a small bowl.

Apply to the affected area.

Leave for 15-25 minutes or until dry.

Rinse with lukewarm water and pat dry.

Repeat regularly until results are visible.

Soak 2 chamomile tea bags in hot water for 5-10 minutes.

Place teabags in refrigerator to cool.

Apply to the affected area and leave for 15-20 minutes.

Repeat daily until results are visible.

Apply slices of avocado to the affected area and leave for 15-20 minutes.

Repeat regularly until results are visible.

Ingredients: 2 tablespoons of either olive, almond or vegetable oil
Remedy.Procedure:
Mix 2 drops of jasmine essential oil and 2 tablespoons of either olive, almond or vegetable oil.

Apply to the affected area and gently massage for 3-4 minutes.

Leave for 20-30 minutes and rinse with lukewarm water.

Repeat regularly until results are visible

Yes!This is the real, primary and an effective home remedy for sunken eyes. Ensure you get at least 7 hours of sleep every day.

Besides,it makes no harm if you take a small nap during the day not more than 30 minutes!

Apply almond oil under the eyes several times a day.

Why Almond oil? Almond oil is rich in Vitamin E, a nourishing vitamin for Skin.

Slice the potatoes and place it on affected spot for around 20 minutes.

Alternatively, you can apply the juices of raw potato directly on the hollow spots.

The sore and darker skin gets replenished with improved blood circulation.

It also relaxes the eye muscles and soothes the nerves.

You can place the warm as well as cool tea bags as you desire.

Never ever try to move out in the sun without wearing a moisturizing sunscreen.

Invest in some good quality moisturizing sunscreen to prevent further damage to the sunken eyes.

Ingredients: Sandalwood paste or Sandalwood essential oils
Remedy.Procedure:
You can apply the sandalwood paste on the dark circles or go with sandalwood essential oils.

Either way, it improves the dark circles, soothes the tired skin and gives a replenished skin.
Just splash some cold water or running water on your face.
Get some rest by placing sliced cucumber on eyes and wake up with fresh, rejuvenated and energetic eyes.
Fish oil is a good source of omega fatty acids that helps in making your skin smooth and healthy when it is applied topically around the eyes

Extract the juice of fresh lemon and dilute with water.

Apply this on the skin around the eyes.

Lemon juice is a good remedy for treating dark patchy skin and it helps in removing dead skin cells aeound the eyes.

Water is very essential in keeping your body healthy.

Drink at least 8 to 10 glasses of water everyday to keep your body healthy and to avoid problems related to skin and hair.
Eat a healthy diet of dark green leafy vegetables such as kale, spinach, broccoli and collard greens to get rid of deep sunken eyes.

Sometimes, it only needs a splash of cold water on your eyes and face.

 You can even put some ice in water to make it really cold.

However, beware! Don't apply this extremely cold water to the skin around your eyes more than a couple of seconds!

Place 6-8 spoons in refrigerator and when they get very cold, take them out.

Place two spoons on your both the closed eyes.

When they get warm, use the next two cold spoons and so on.

Ingredients: Two tea bags(Black tea, Chamomile tea or Green tea)
Remedy.Procedure:
Take ice cold water in a cup.

Dip two tea bags in it and take them out.

Squeeze the tea bags.

Lie down and close your eyes.

Place the two chilled bags on your eyes.

The caffeine tea helps constrict blood vessels to reduce swelling around eyes while the anti-irritants in herbal teas reduce redness and inflammation.

Let the tea bags sit on your eyes for the time they attain normal temperature.

Dip them again in the cold water and repeat the steps.

Do for as long as you cannot exceed half an hour.

Take an egg and separate its white portion in a bowl.

Beat this egg white till it gets stiff.

Take a brush(or use your fingers) and apply this stiff egg white around your eyes.

Leave it for about 15-20 minutes till it dries up.

Now wash your face with cold water.

Take out a chilled cucumber from the vegetable basket and cut it into roundels.

Take two slices and put back the rest of them in the fridge.

Now place these cucumber slices on your eyes and relax.

Let them be there for the time till they get warmed.

Now take two slices out of the fridge and repeat.

Cut a potato in round slices and place two slices on both of your eyes.

Leave them for 15-20 minutes and wash them with cold water.

Peel and grate two potatoes and squeeze to get potato juice.

Dip two cotton balls in this juice and keep them on eyes for 20-25 minutes.

remove and wash off with cold water.

Close your eyes and lightly press the ring finger under your eyes.

Move your finger in arc shape from inside corner of your eye towards outside.

Make 10-15 rounds.

Be gentle enough because eyes are very sensitive organs.

Repeat the massaging movements for the other eye too.
While more salt in your diet can lead to formation of eye bags, the salty warm water compress can reduce the same eye bags.

When your body gets deprived of water, it starts accumulating water as a defense.

When you drink lots of water, it will automatically release water resulting in reduced puffiness.
Dip cotton pads in chilled milk and place on eyelids while relaxing.

Apply 1-2 egg whites in the area around your eyes with a brush or a soft cloth, and leave till it dries up.

Wash off.

This remedy will result in making the area around the eyes feel tighter and look less puffy.
Getting enough sleep for at least 7-8 hours daily is needed for every individual to get rid of eye puffiness.
